title: Beautiful unit with w/d, hw floors, & resort style amenities
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   Interested in this property?  Click on: Reply to this listing for more information  ** if you are texting us, please include the link to the listing so we can identify what you are inquiring on  Beautiful new apartment for rent in Lakeshore East Chicago with wide plank floors, floor to ceiling windows, walk-in closets, in-unit laundry, and many other top-of-the-line finishes. This convertible apartment features include: -Bosch appliances with cabinet-finished fronts; gas cooking, and built-in recirculating hoods -Daltile™ baths -Hansgrohe® fixtures - frameless glass showers **select units include Private outdoor balconies* This Lakeshore East apartment building amenities include: -25-yard indoor lap pool -Splash pad and hydrotherapy pool -Fitness center with sweeping lakefront views -Strength studio for HIIT workouts -Motion studio for yoga and spin classes -Locker rooms with steam rooms -Spa featuring salon & massage suite -Screening room featuring soft modular seating -Game room with billiards and shuffleboard -Golf and sports simulator for year-round play -Kids club indoor play space -Outdoor pool with cabanas -Tiered sunning lawn with fire pit and grilling area -Indoor and outdoor dog run  Velocity Apartment Group 312-253-7403 Availability and pricing may change at any time without notice. Ads subject to errors and omissions. Please contact agent for additional questions and information.  Interested in this property?
